items.sentence: I\'m surprised Tom gave Mary all the money she asked for.
Tom and Mary told me they had a good time at the concert.
At this time, the victims\' names aren\'t being released.
I thought Tom was going to be the one who had to do that.
I googled you and found out you\'ve spent time in prison.
I want Tom to do that, but he told me he wouldn\'t do it.
I wish there were a more modern translation of this book.
I wonder if Tom has ever considered buying a smaller car.
Recess is a good chance for kids to run around and relax.
She calls him every night and talks for at least an hour.
